item.title: How to factor a big integer?
item.description: 1. Abstract This essay is to explain the factoring of an integer 18393075391668469672027802484408130559. The result and time: Factors Time/s Programming Language 104743 Java 1299721 1 (together with the first one) Java 283839307517 Java 475999687667509 102 (together with the third one) Java 103 (in total) 2.
